verbs.description: The press [V: has] dishonestly smeared President Donald Trump since he described criminal illegal immigrants who are members of MS-13 and other gangs as " animals " at Wednesday 's White House California Sanctuary State Roundtable . But on Thursday , the Associated Press deleted and replaced a tweet which falsely claimed that Trump 's remark referred to all illegal immigrants . Even
